title: Pixel 5 not able to access Pixel Stand settings
content:
Just received my Pixel 5 and been setting it all up the way I want. However I've noticed that I am unable to access the settings for the Pixel Stand.

The phone charges just fine when placed on the stand, however I can't find the settings anywhere. There was no pop-up when I first placed it on the stand and it is not showing up under Previously Connected Devices.

Any help would be greatly appreciated as I was hoping to use all the features of the stand.

Thanks!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
